name: 记忆消除器MemoryCleaner
description:
这是一款2d像素交互游戏，你将扮演一名饱受痛苦折磨寻求治愈的青年，在崩溃的边缘偶然发现了一个可以消除记忆的神秘机器。为了终止痛苦回忆继续折磨自己，你决定戴上了这个神秘机器。你需要操纵记忆消除器来探索这名青年的大脑，了解这名青年的过往经历。面对大脑中的众多回忆碎片，你是否能成功的帮助青年解决被痛苦折磨的难题呢？

This is a 2D pixel interaction game, you will play a suffering young people seeking a cure, in the edge of collapse accidentally discovered a mysterious machine can delete memory. In order to stop the painful memories continue to torture myself, you do not hesitate to stay in this mysterious machine. You need to manipulate the memory cleaner to explore the young man's brain and learn about his past experiences. With so many pieces of memory in your brain, can you successfully help young people deal with their painful problems?
